feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Revenue recognition key EPMFC EPPM (Project Management) module in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition.
entry.content:
I have a question about the EPPM (Project Management) module in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition. With the revenue recognition key EPMFC, revenue is recognized based on the cost-based percentage-of-completion method. When actual costs exceed planned costs, can the progress rate exceed 100% and be recognized accordingly? Or does the progress rate cap at 100% even if actual costs surpass planned costs?

Examples:
- When planned cost = actual cost:
Planned cost 500, actual cost 500, revenue 1,000 (100%)
- When planned cost > actual cost:
Planned cost 500, actual cost 250, revenue 500 (50%)
- Questioned case: when planned cost < actual cost:
Is it planned cost 500, actual cost 1,000, revenue 1,000 (100%), or
planned cost 500, actual cost 1,000, revenue 2,000 (200%)?

entry.title: Posting of Recognized Revenue for Cost‚ÄëBased Percentage‚Äëof‚ÄëCompletion Revenue Projects
entry.content:
Regarding Project Sales (4I9) and Event-Based Revenue Recognition (4GQ) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition, we have configured a revenue-bearing project and set the revenue recognition key to EPMFC (cost-based percentage of completion). Recognized Cost of Sales (Recognized COS) has been posted without issues, but Recognized Revenue is still not being posted. Could you help us identify the cause?

With Planned COS of 10,000,000 JPY and Recognized COS of 5,000,000 JPY, the percentage of completion should be 50%, and Recognized Revenue should be 10,000,000 JPY.

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud Report Formatting (Financial Statements / Dynamic Reporting)
entry.content:
Dear All,

Could you please confirm how we can develop custom forms in the Public Cloud environment similar to what we are used to in RISE or On-Prem solutions ‚Äî where we typically utilize a custom driver program to call custom Adobe Forms?

From what I understand, the functionality in Public Cloud seems to be limited to formatting existing forms by copying them or adding a few additional fields. However, I have the following specific requirements which involve more advanced formatting and development capabilities:

  1. Development of a New Custom Program:
    Ability to create and execute a completely new program that displays a custom Adobe Form, without attaching it to or replacing with any standard form.

  2. Formatting Financial Statements:
    The current formats for Balance Sheet and Cash Flow statements are missing key formatting elements (e.g., bold or italic headings). We need to apply advanced formatting to improve readability and presentation.

  3. Displaying Dynamic Images in Forms:
    Requirement to dynamically display images (e.g., product return images, reflecting damages) within delivery or return sales order forms, after uploading them to a repository or storage area in Public Cloud.

entry.title: BAPI for updating Payment Reference number
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We are currently working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud ‚Äì Grow Edition and have encountered a scenario where we need to update the Payment Reference Number in an accounting entry via automation. However, we have been unable to identify a suitable BAPI or Behavior Definition that allows us to perform this update.

We are aware of the I_JOURNALENTRYTP interface, which is typically used for updating accounting entries. However, we have not been able to locate a relevant field within this API that supports updating the payment reference.

 

We would appreciate your assistance in identifying:

Any available standard APIs or extensibility options to achieve this.

Relevant documentation or alternative approaches to update the Payment Reference Number in accounting entries.

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Unable to Execute ‚ÄúAdvance Return for Tax on Sales/Purchases‚Äù in Background
entry.content:
While executing the GST report using the Fiori app ‚ÄúCreate Advance Return for Tax on Sales/Purchases‚Äù, we noticed that the option ‚ÄúExecute in Background‚Äù is greyed out and cannot be selected.

In the ECC system, there was an option to process the batch input session immediately or execute the report directly in background.

However, in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, we can only execute the report interactively. When the batch input session is created, it can be viewed under the app ‚ÄúBatch Input Sessions in My Area‚Äù, but there is no option to process these sessions in background - only foreground execution is possible.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: G/L Account master data not updated in Quality environment
entry.content:
During the deployment project, we are facing an issue updating the Chart of account and the related settings per company code.

indeed, in quality an account doesn't exist and we don't have any dependencies defined while releasing the order or that given account. only ones are out own transport request which are already imported in Quality environment.

Steps to reproduce 

Go in tile Manage G/L account Master Data

Select account 

make a change in the account (untick blocked for planning as an example)

save your change

Release the order

Import order in quality

result : Account doesn't exist in YCOA

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Goods Receipt Slip when posting GR in Inbound delivery
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Is there a way to print the goods receipt slip (GOODS_RECEIPT_PO_SLIP) in the public cloud when I post goods receipt via the ‚ÄúChange Inbound Deliveries - Deliveries‚Äù app? Can the form be stored somewhere? As far as I know, PPF is not available here. Is that correct?

Best regards,

Lucas

entry.title: Unavailability of Released CDS view for Warehouse task - Internal moment
entry.content:
Requirement - Pack outbound delivery - HU Based - GI Label trigger with left over stock

We are printing the GI label with reference to the Outbound delivery number from SAP to 3rd Party system while using the App Pack outbound deliveries with reference to the Outbound delivery number. It is a Warehouse task and getting confirmed, but the warehouse task details do not contain the reference document of the Outbound delivery number in any CDS Views or SAP standard tables.

However, we found the SAP standard CDS view "I_EWM_handlingunititem", which contains the Outbound Delivery details. But this is not yet released in the 2508 version.  

Technical Design: We are using an event-based triggering process for the above requirement. Below is the Event used for Warehouse Internal moment(Leftover Stock) Labels.

Event - sap/s4/beh/WarehouseOrder/TaskConfirmed/v1

Once the packing is done in the app "Pack Outbound Delivery", the Warehouse Task event gets triggered. Based on the Warehouse task, we need to obtain all the required details from the Outbound Delivery. So the challenge is that we don't have a released CDS View(I_EWM_handlingunititem) to find the Outbound delivery number linkage from packed outbound delivery warehouse task details. We need a workaround solution as this requirement is crucial for the Business to operate and print the labels in the warehouse.

entry.title: Inspection results and specifications from the Semi-Finished Goods (SFG) to be printed on the CoA, i
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have a Certificate of Analysis (CoA) scenario where the client wants the inspection results and specifications from the Semi-Finished Goods (SFG) to be printed on the CoA, instead of those from the Finished Goods (FG). Both SFG and FG undergo 03 in-process inspections, but the majority of testing is performed at the SFG level. However, the CoA should still display the material number and batch details of the Finished Goods‚Äîonly the results and specifications should be sourced from the SFG. Please suggest if this can be achived in standard functionality.

entry.title: Challenges in Modify Batch Details at Sub-Item Level in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are unable to identify the appropriate BADI to modify batch details at the sub-item level when the item quantity reaches the source quantity (as maintained in the material master).

Our requirement is that once the item quantity reaches the source quantity, the batch details of the next subsequent sub-items should be cleared; otherwise, we are unable to proceed with the PGI (Post Goods Issue).

Could you please suggest a suitable BADI that can be used to modify the sub-item batch details?

I have gone through some standard documentation but could not find concrete details for these scenarios. If anyone has already implemented a similar requirement, it would be very helpful if you could share:

  • Blogs, SAP Notes, or official references
  • Your implementation experiences or best practices
  • Any limitations or workarounds you came across in Public Cloud

Your valuable inputs will help us in moving forward with this requirement.

Thanks in advance for your support!

entry.title: Attachments Not Transferred from Purchase Requisition to Purchase Order in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm currently working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I‚Äôve encountered a situation I‚Äôd like to share with the community.

When creating a purchase requisition using the ME51N application, I attach supporting documents (e.g., specifications, quotations). However, after converting the requisition into a purchase order, I notice that the attachments are not transferred to the PO.

I‚Äôd like to understand:

  • Is this the standard behavior in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
  • Is there a configuration or workaround that allows attachments to be automatically transferred from the requisition to the purchase order?
  • Would using SAP Document Management Service (DMS) or a scheduled job like ‚ÄúSend attachments to SAP S/4HANA Cloud‚Äù be a recommended solution?

If anyone has faced a similar scenario or implemented a solution, I‚Äôd really appreciate your insights and feedback.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: challenges facing while creating CBO
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am working with Custom Business Objects in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I have created two CBOs:

  1. Product Group Management (CBO1)

    • CODPROD (CHAR, 4) ‚Üí Product Group

    • CODDESCR (CHAR, 30) ‚Üí Description

  2. Assign Product Group (CBO2)

    • CODPROD (CHAR, 4) ‚Üí Product Group

    • CODDESCR (CHAR, 30) ‚Üí Description

    • CHECKSER (CHAR, 1) ‚Üí Serial Check

    • ZSERIAL (CHAR, 30) ‚Üí Mandatory List of serials

My requirement:
In CBO2, I want to fetch CODPROD and CODDESCR values from CBO1 (instead of maintaining them separately).

Problem:
I tried using association from CBO2 to CBO1, but I am getting errors. It seems the CBO framework only allows referencing the root entity, not directly fetching additional fields.

Question:
üëâ How can I properly model this scenario so that CBO2 uses CODPROD from CBO1, and also displays CODDESCR without duplicating data? Should I handle this via association + custom CDS view join, or is there a direct way in CBO itself?

Thanks in advance for your guidance!

ABAP Development SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Extensibility

entry.title: Purchase Order Accrual - Tax postings in S4HC
entry.content:
I would like to ask the expert advice regarding "Purchase Order Accrual - Tax postings" on KBA 3157756 and Help page.
https://me.sap.com/notes/3157756/E
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0fa84c9d9c634132b7c4abb9ffdd8f06/10c9485e3dc849928ca41ac92d72132a.html?locale=en-US

Query:
In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, it appears that the BAdI for tax calculation provided in the Private Cloud is not on the available list. Is there a method to perform tax posting within the Accruals Engine in the Public Cloud Edition? Can BADI_ACE_DOCUMENT_SCHEMA_CUST be used as a substitute, or is there another way to achieve this without using a BAdI? I would appreciate any guidance you can provide on this topic.
Thank you for your support & Kindly Regards,
Koji Mikami

entry.title: How to validate mandatory attachment in Post General Journal Entries app in SAP S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello,

In the application ‚ÄòPost General Journal Entries‚Äô, the user requires a validation or an indication that prompts the processor to attach a mandatory supporting document. If no attachment is provided, the system should display an error message preventing the posting.

We have analyzed this requirement and attempted to implement a validation rule; however, we did not find any option related to attachments for validation. Additionally, we explored potential BAdIs to achieve this functionality, but unfortunately, no suitable option was found for this scenario.
